mapper.select: SELECT R.ROOM_NO, R.ROOM_NAME, R.ROOM_TYPE, R.ROOM_PRICE, R.CAPACITY, R.STATUS FROM ROOM R WHERE R.ROOM_TYPE = #{roomType} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ROOM_RESERV RP WHERE RP.ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_NO AND RP.PAY_STATUS = 'Y' AND ( TO_DATE(#{checkInDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < RP.CHECK_OUT_DATE AND TO_DATE(#{checkOutDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > RP.CHECK_IN_DATE ) ) ORDER BY R.ROOM_NO ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE ROOM SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_NAME , ROOM_TYPE , ROOM_RESERV_NO , AMOUNT , RESERV_DATE , PAY_STATUS FROM ROOM_RESERV A JOIN ROOM B ON (A.ROOM_NO = B.ROOM_NO) WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT ROOM_NAME , ROOM_TYPE , ROOM_PRICE , ROOM_RESERV_NO , AMOUNT , CHECK_IN_DATE , CHECK_OUT_DATE , RESERV_DATE , TID , PAY_STATUS FROM ROOM_RESERV A JOIN ROOM B ON (A.ROOM_NO = B.ROOM_NO) WHERE A.ROOM_RESERV_NO = #{roomReservNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ROOM_RESERV SET PAY_STATUS = 'N' , RREFUND_STATUS = 'Y' , RREFUND_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ROOM_RESERV_NO = #{roomReservNo} AND PAY_STATUS = 'Y' AND RREFUND_STATUS = 'N'
